title: 'The mother of all deals': EU and India strike landmark agreement amid U.S. tariffs
desc: Leaders of the European Union and India announced a wide-ranging trade agreement on Tuesday, which came after nearly two decades of on-and-off negotiations that became increasingly urgent in the last six months after stiff tariffs were imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump.

title: SIR hearing: Place in electoral roll is a ‘qualified right’, Election Commission says in Supreme Court
desc: The Election Commission asserts to the Supreme Court that citizenship must be continuously fulfilled to maintain electoral roll eligibility.

title: 'Where are you, son?' Iranian father's morgue odyssey breaks hearts
desc: A long video of an Iranian father's agonized trudge among the bloodied corpses of slain protestors in a Tehran morgue in search of his son has seared viewers with the enormity of the state's mass killings this month.
